title: Option to revert back to the old health bar? (PBE)
body: So, I get on PBE and I see some changes, which I hope can get reverted, the health bar. ( or at least a setting to revert back to the old one) If you have a PBE account and you've played recently with it you probably know what I am talking about. Don't you think there should be an option to revert back to the old health bar?

replies.body: Riot will most likely implement an option like they did for the new voice caster
YEAH, these new riot development team just come form a shitty MOBA mobile game and think people will love it! I miss the old team );
